subject: [LSF/MM/BPF TOPIC][RFC PATCH v4 00/27] Private Memory Nodes (w/ Compressed RAM)

reviews.author: Gregory Price
reviews.summary: Raised concerns about the feasibility of a 1-to-1 mapping of node-to-pgmap for existing ZONE_DEVICE users, suggesting it may lead to performance issues on non-NUMA systems.

2026-02-26.patch_summary: The patch introduces Private Memory Nodes (PMNs) and Compressed RAM, aiming to improve memory management on NUMA systems.
